snippet.title: The Abandoned Planet - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Release date: August 29, 2024
Platforms: PC, Mac, Linux, Android, iOS... maybe consoles later. We'll see!

Gameplay: A classic, 2D, first-person, point and click adventure game inspired by games like Myst and Riven with a generous dash of the LucasArt adventures of the 90s. The Abandoned Planet is sure to scratch that old-school adventure game itch. 

Story: When a wormhole tears open in space, an astronaut is hurled down and crashes on a distant planet. But where is she? Where are all the inhabitants of the planet? And how is she going to get back home? Solve the puzzle and piece together the mystery!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2014470/The_Abandoned_Planet/
Follow: https://twitter.com/DexterStardust
Website: https://www.dexterstardust.com/

• A unique 2D first person adventure. 
• An HD UI laid over beautiful hand painted pixel art.
• A quick and responsive navigation system which gives a modern and nimble feel to the gameplay.
• Solve inventory and environment based puzzles.
• 5 Acts with over 300 unique areas to explore.
• Fully animated cutscenes.
• Fully voiced in English

Complete Voice Over in English. Subtitle and UI text in 12 world languages:

• English
• Spanish
• Italian
• French
• German
• Haitian Creole
• Japanese
• Korean
• Portuguese
• Russian
• Chinese Simplified
• Chinese Traditional
